channel.title: Posts on Europa Espa単ol-English Class 2016
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Europa Espa単ol-English Class 2016

item.title: Felices vacaciones
item.description: Hola a todos, This week you can see in the yellow book two new pages: Song about “La se単orita Z” and picture of “La enfermera C”. This two letters have the same sound (like a snake), when Z goes with a, u, o and when C goes with e and i. Song about “La se単orita Z”: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-HZsQylt8xE Song about “La enfermera C”: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QPeWlEtyx24 You will see the letters we have seen.

item.title: Books this week
item.description: Hola a todos, This week we have seen two new characters in Letrilandia which sounds the same in Spanish (b and v) the children are taking Letrilandia home to read them with you. (audio attached, pag 45 and 47). In the yellow book you will see different words written with b and v, please try to write with them as last week you did with y and ll. You can read them again (y and ll) and continue reading until pag 51.
